AboutMe.aboutDescription:
I'm a developer who enjoys coding, drinking coffee, learning new things and gaming in my free time. To give you a brief about myself:
I studied Biology at university!!! yea everyone surprised by hearing that but in the last year of my education, I found out about the development field and computer science then it dragged me into it. So I started to self-study, coding different projects and participating in the open-source community.
Besides my development life, I'm a pro gamer and I play online games for almost 15 years.
